name: Dale Chang
blurb: Senior Software Engineer blowing out fully-featured web applications, ranging from UX, REST APIs, data, analytics, security, containerization, and scalability.
shortBio: Dale started as a back-end software engineer and NLP/text analyst as a federal contractor in the legal and health space. He has worked in the Washington DC area and served a for a variety of agencies including the DoJ, NASA, and CMS. He now works in Denver, CO as a senior software engineer, developing modular and intelligent platforms to help inform customers on data trends in finance and health.
